text: Show MC
─ ─ Spring is the season of meeting and parting~!
Show MC

Many of you who are watching this program, whether you're
graduating, starting your job, or returning to your hometown...
Show MC

I know there are people who are leaving for new
horizons for all kinds of reasons!
Show MC

Do you Illumination Stars have any springtime memories
related to meeting and parting?

...E-Eh.
Right...

...I don't have anything I can tell you about yet,
but ......

I wish to make many memories from now on...
That's what I'm hoping for...
I'm the same as Mano.

I don't have any episodes that I can talk about yet...
but I'm sure it'll eventually happen.
Show MC

I see... so you're both the type who don't cry at
graduation ceremonies?

Well,
I've never cried at them.
Motion
Show MC

I see, I see... What about you Meguru-chan?
Any memories of encounters and farewells?

I have fond memories of my junior high
school graduation ceremony!

I think it's partly because it's my most
recent "farewell" memory.

I still feel sad when
I remember it now.
Show MC
In contrast to both of them!
Show MC

Even though you girls are very close friends in the
same unit, you all feel differently about things~!
Show MC

I thought you girls were all on the same page,
since Illumine is sometimes called [3-in-1].
Motion
Show MC

─Right, so before I talk to everyone at Illumine,
They would like to sing something first~
So please listen everyone.──────
